snippet: The change is a strategy shift at MSNBC, which long has filled its schedule with left-leaning political commentary and now is moving toward straight news from 9 a.m. until 3 p.m.
abstract: MSNBC, confronted with weak ratings for its afternoon programs, is changing its daytime schedule to concentrate on straight news reporting.
lead_paragraph: The change is a strategy shift at MSNBC, which long has filled its schedule with left-leaning political commentary and now is moving toward straight news from 9 a.m. until 3 p.m.

headline.main: MSNBC Removes Two Hosts to Focus on Straight News
headline.print_headline: MSNBC Removes Two Hosts to Focus on Straight News
